ca.corefacility.gview.map.items

Interface BackboneTextItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BackboneItem, BackbonePinnable, java.util.EventListener, GViewEventListener, MapComponent, MapItem, TextItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackboneTextItem, BackboneLabelItem, BackboneTextItemImp

    public interface BackboneTextItem
extends TextItem, BackbonePinnable, BackboneItem
    Describes a Text item that is to be pinned to the backbone.
    Author:
    aaron
